topics.name: kra
topics.title: Key Results Areas
topics.description: The areas of your job that when you are doing these successfully, you are winning at work.

topics.name: work
topics.title: Work Goal
topics.description: A SMART goal for work that has a specific measurement that you can accomplish this month.

topics.name: education
topics.title: Education Goal
topics.description: A SMART goal to further your educational growth that has a specific measurement that you can accomplish this month.

topics.name: character
topics.title: Character or Discipline
topics.description: A character trait that you will be working on, or a habit that will create discipline in your life to affect your character.
